markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Brontosaurus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2922)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Brontosauruses are truly gigantic behemoths, herbivores large enough to be unafraid of all but the most massive predators. Brontosauruses have stout bodies and long, sinuous necks and tails. Although their feet are capable of crushing entire buildings, these herbivores are generally considerate of where they step.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Brontosaurus.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Brontosaurus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2922)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Dinosaur" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=576" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 100 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +16; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +0

**Con** +5

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +16 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 220

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +23 ([Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+13 bludgeoning plus [Improved Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=66)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +23 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 bludgeoning

**Tail Sweep** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The brontosaurus makes a tail Strike and compares the attack roll to the AC of up to three foes, each of whom must be within its tail's melee reach and adjacent to at least one other target. It rolls damage only once and applies it to each creature hit. A Tail Sweep counts as two attacks for its multiple attack penalty.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=81)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Huge or smaller, foot, DC 29

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-391" />
name: Brontosaurus
